sourcesContent:
import { FaPlus } from "react-icons/fa"

 function AddItem({newItem,setNewItem,handleSubmit}) {
  return (
    <form className="addForm">
        <label htmlFor="addItem">
            Add Item
        </label>
        <input autoFocus 
            id="addItem"
            type="text"
            placeholder="Add Item"
            required
            value={newItem}
            onChange={(e) => setNewItem()}
        />
        <button
            type="submit"
            aria-label ='Add Item'
        
        >
            <FaPlus/>
        </button>


    </form>
  )
}
export default AddItem
